title: Who can help me to finally claim the warranty for my Google Pixel 3?
content:
I've tried to claim the factory-warranty on my Pixel 3 for almost a year now, but can't get it done. In the beginning of 2020 I talked to someone from Google, but didn't hear anything back and haven't been able to reach them since then. So how can I claim my warranty on this device? How can I even reach Google, I'm wondering. I'm situated in The Netherlands, by the way.

Great thanks!!
